    Adds a new transaction to the model if valid, and updates the view.

    Adds a transaction to the model.
    AmountFilter - Class in model.Filter
    A concrete implementation of the TransactionFilter interface that filters transactions based on a specific amount.
    AmountFilter(double) - Constructor for class model.Filter.AmountFilter
    Constructs an AmountFilter with the specified amount.
    applyFilter() - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Applies the currently set filter strategy to the transaction list and updates the view with the filtered results.

    F

    filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in class model.Filter.AmountFilter
    Filters the given list of transactions to include only those with an amount equal to the specified filter value.
    filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in class model.Filter.CategoryFilter
    Filters the given list of transactions to include only those with a category that matches the filter value (case-insensitive).
    filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in interface model.Filter.TransactionFilter
    Filters the given list of transactions according to a specific strategy.

    I

    InputValidation - Class in controller
    Utility class for validating input values such as amount and category.
    isValidAmount(double) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
    Validates whether the given amount is within the valid range (0 < amount ≤ 1000).
    isValidCategory(String) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
    Validates whether the given category is non-null, non-empty, alphabetic, and one of the predefined valid categories.

    T
